document.full_text: cuba's communist party selected president raul castro and a hardline ally as its top chiefs on tuesday, entrusting old guard leaders to steer wide-ranging reforms of the caribbean island's tattered economy.
document.title: cuban communists opt for old guard to lead reforms
lines_and_colors: cuba's communist party selected president raul castro and a hardline ally as its top chiefs on tuesday, entrusting old guard leaders to steer wide-ranging reforms of the caribbean island's tattered economy.
